h2. Macros

The wiki system support three categories of macros.

h3. Page Macros

These macros extend the wiki syntax
The tasklet of these macros should set params.result as a page

{{children: bullets page:Page}}


h3. Wiki Macros

These macros are part of the core wiki system
The tasklet of these macros should set params.result as tuple first item being the output of this macro the second one beingg the document
{{children: bullets page:Wiki}}


h3. Preprocessor Macros

These macros do not generate HTML output but return WIKI which in its turn will be parsed again
The tasklet of these macros should set params.result as tuple first item being the output of this macro the second one beingg the document

{{children: bullets page:Preprocess}}

{{cssstyle
.span9 ul { -moz-column-count:3;
            -webkit-column-count:3;
            column-count:3;
}
}}
